`minipdf` is a package for creating simple, single-page PDF documents.



## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/coolbutuseless/minipdf) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("coolbutuseless/minipdf")
```

See the online documentation [here](https://coolbutuseless.github.io/package/minipdf/index.html) (thanks to [pkgdown](https://cran.r-project.org/package=pkgdown))
